description:
Search the homes at the Venezuelan-Colombian border and demolish the ones marked with D. Do it fast. Released in August 2015, in remembrance of the day the Venezuelan government sent their military to raid and demolish the homes of many people living by the Venezuelan-Colombian border, whether they were living legally or not in the country.

The game uses the keyboard (WASD and IJKL keys), and requires two players to be played.
